Data Manipulation
```{r}
xValue <- 1:10
yValue <- cumsum(rnorm(10))
data <- data.frame(xValue,yValue)
```


Lineplots for graphs between x and y vertices per part
```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x=xValue, y=yValue)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Totoal Cost") +
  geom_line(color="cornflowerblue", size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) +
  ggtitle("Evolution of something") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```
